analysis.description:
PlayerExchangeCore.pausePlayerContracts has external calls inside a loop:
	- ! playerTokenContract.paused() (/unique_chucks/10/0x56434ad1e38a564e76eae08c7118e5e7b450aa6c.sol#669-670)

PlayerExchangeCore.pausePlayerContracts has external calls inside a loop:
	- playerTokenContract.pause() (/unique_chucks/10/0x56434ad1e38a564e76eae08c7118e5e7b450aa6c.sol#670)

PlayerExchangeCore.unpausePlayerContracts has external calls inside a loop:
	- playerTokenContract.paused() (/unique_chucks/10/0x56434ad1e38a564e76eae08c7118e5e7b450aa6c.sol#676-681)

PlayerExchangeCore.unpausePlayerContracts has external calls inside a loop:
	- playerTokenContract.unpause() (/unique_chucks/10/0x56434ad1e38a564e76eae08c7118e5e7b450aa6c.sol#677-678)

PlayerExchangeCore.setSellDividendPercentageFee has external calls inside a loop:
	- playerTokenContract.setSellDividendPercentageFee(_fee) (/unique_chucks/10/0x56434ad1e38a564e76eae08c7118e5e7b450aa6c.sol#689-690)

PlayerExchangeCore.setBuyDividendPercentageFee has external calls inside a loop:
	- playerTokenContract.setBuyDividendPercentageFee(_fee) (/unique_chucks/10/0x56434ad1e38a564e76eae08c7118e5e7b450aa6c.sol#696-697)

PlayerExchangeCore.portfolioSummary has external calls inside a loop:
	- (totalTokens[i],totalCost[i],totalValue[i]) = playerTokenContract.portfolioSummary(_address) (/unique_chucks/10/0x56434ad1e38a564e76eae08c7118e5e7b450aa6c.sol#722-723)

Reentrancy in PlayerToken.setBCFContractAddress (/unique_chucks/10/0x56434ad1e38a564e76eae08c7118e5e7b450aa6c.sol#349-351):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(candidateContract.implementsERC721()) (/unique_chucks/10/0x56434ad1e38a564e76eae08c7118e5e7b450aa6c.sol#350)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- bcfContract_ (/unique_chucks/10/0x56434ad1e38a564e76eae08c7118e5e7b450aa6c.sol#350-351)

Reentrancy in PlayerToken.setOriginalOwner (/unique_chucks/10/0x56434ad1e38a564e76eae08c7118e5e7b450aa6c.sol#366-392):
	External calls:
	- (_playerId,_cardOwner,None,_isFirstGeneration) = bcfContract_.playerCards(_playerCardId) (/unique_chucks/10/0x56434ad1e38a564e76eae08c7118e5e7b450aa6c.sol#381-382)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- originalOwner_ (/unique_chucks/10/0x56434ad1e38a564e76eae08c7118e5e7b450aa6c.sol#392)
